To delete a bucket using the Couchbase Web Console:
Go to the Data Buckets tab and click the blue triangle next to the bucket name.
Click on the Delete button.
The warning message will appear before you remove the bucket.
Click on Delete and confirm the deletion.
You can also use the CLI command bucket-delete or REST API command rest-bucket-delete.
